law.text: Any person dissatisfied with the decision of the racing commission under KRS 230.367 may appeal to the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with the provisions of KRS 243.560 to 243.590.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 468, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 24, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 8, effective June 17, 1978.
